book.synopsis: Playwright/novelist/screenwriter Goldman analyzes Broadway from the perspective of the audiences, playwrights, critics, producers and actors. “Very nearly perfect... It is a loose-limbed, gossipy, insider, savvy, nuts-and-bolts report on the annual search for the winning numbers that is now big-time American commercial theatre.” –Christopher Lehmann-Haupt, The New York Times
book.title_long: THE SEASON A Candid Look At Broadway (Limelight)
book.dimensions: Height: 8.97 Inches, Length: 6.03 Inches, Weight: 1.56087281496 Pounds, Width: 1.01 Inches
